comment: Create an atom under a hyperplane. Part of proof of Lemma B in [Crawley] p. 112. ( ~ lhpat analog.) TODO: This changes ` U C V ` in ~ l1cvpat and ~ l1cvat to ` U e. H ` , which in turn change ` U e. H ` in ~ islshpcv to ` U C V ` , with a couple of conversions of span to atom. Seems convoluted. Would a direct proof be better? (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
